game.synopsis:
The world has been shattered, and humanity clings to what's left.
In the aftermath, civilization is shattered, and everyone has to work hard to survive.
You play as a survivor in the wasteland,
fighting for your life and taking what you can find.
Along the way, you will encounter both fellow travelers
and dangerous bandits. The challenge is to make the best use of your limited resources and skills
to stay alive, while also avoiding the risks you face.
